availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bryant N. Dawson (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and constable)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and constable. Kentucky native. Son of John Dawson. Married to Eliza Purdy Dawson. Father of William Dawson, F. B. Dawson, Charles Dawson, and Lula Dawson. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Constable in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed one enslaved person owned by Mrs. Webb in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 357A.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 225B.
